dt-option.name: search.return
dt-option.summary: Enable / disable DataTables' search on return
dt-option.description: This initialisation option allows the number of searches to be reduced. When this option is set to `true`, searches will only occur when the return key is pressed and focus is on the searchbox. This is particularly useful when working with large datasets or server-side processing. The default value for this option is `false` meaning that a search will occur on every keypress when the searchbox is focussed.
